morning_jazz.title: Spectral Mornings
morning_jazz.description: Start your day with smooth jazz selections from classic and contemporary artists. A perfect blend of instrumental and vocal jazz to energize your morning.

electronic_beats.title: Rythms Disjunctions
electronic_beats.description: Immerse yourself in the world of electronic music, featuring the best in house, techno, and ambient. From underground gems to electronic classics.
